import React,{Component} from 'react'; import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; import { requests } from '../json/requests.json' class RequestEditor extends Component{ constructor(){ super() this.state={ requests } this.handleSubmit = this.handleSubmit.bind(this); } handleSubmit(e){ e.preventDefault(); let request={ 'problem':e.target.problem.value, 'motivo':e.target.motivo.value, 'urgency_nid':e.target.urgency_nid.value, 'asset_nid':'' } this.setState({ requests:[...this.state.requests,request] }); } render(){ return(
Desfibrilador Nihon kohden
Modelo: Cardioli
En servicio
Urgencia
Problema
Estado del equipo
) } } export default RequestEditor;
